channel.title: Fallen-Reunion [317] | Old-School | Pking | Unique | Updated Daily
channel.description:
Fallen-Reunion 317 RSPS
Hey Guys! Im Stylo HD, Im a Player Moderator at Fallen-Reunion.
Currently our server is undergoing a Recruitment Scheme, this is a challenge in which current players must recruit new players to win a prize. If you join VIA this topic you will recieve a unique in-game item.
A Little About Us
Fallen-Reunion is a 317 Old-School Server that hasnt been around long, we're only just currently leaving BETA stage and advertising for our server is beginning. We have two very dedicated Admins, 2 player moderators, 2 global moderators, 3 forum moderators and help desk moderators. So this server is a very clean and enjoyable place to be!
How to Join and Claim your Unique Items
To join the game and get your unique in-game items you must:
- Visit: fallen-reunion.com/forums/viewto...&t=258 - Create an Account on the Forums (takes a few seconds) - Once your account is made comment on the thread above or ( fallen-reunion.com/forums/viewto...&t=258 ) and comment(post) " I was brought here from Stylo HD's Tech Game Thread " or something similar.
This would mean a lot to us, to have more people join our amazing community and fantastic server.
Heres some Links to give you a rough idea of what our server is like.
Trailer made by a player : youtube.com/watch?v=FkjuiJrbuZM
Official Website : fallen-reunion.com/
Thank You for taking time and reading this, I hope to see you all in-game, feel free to add me and ask for any help!
